## Public Member Functions

### assignCustomValue() {#a8091aa16f8e98b91cb2e4fa858a06089}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>unsigned anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;RISCVCallLowering.cpp&#125;::RISCVOutgoingValueHandler::assignCustomValue (<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/calllowering/arginfo">CallLowering::ArgInfo</a> &amp; Arg, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccvalassign">CCValAssign</a> &gt; VAs, std::function&lt; void()&gt; &#42; Thunk)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Handle custom values, which may be passed into one or more of <code>VAs</code>.

<code>If</code> the handler wants the assignments to be delayed until after mem loc assignments, then it sets <code>Thunk</code> to the thunk to do the assignment. 
<SectionUser title="Returns">
The number of <code>VAs</code> that have been assigned including the first one, and which should therefore be skipped from further processing.
</SectionUser>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/lib/target/riscv/gisel/riscvcalllowering-cpp/#l00102">102</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/lib/target/riscv/gisel/riscvcalllowering-cpp">RISCVCallLowering.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### assignValueToAddress() {#af1779518d5baec53b2ce17673169282f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;RISCVCallLowering.cpp&#125;::RISCVOutgoingValueHandler::assignValueToAddress (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> ValVReg, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> Addr, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llt">LLT</a> MemTy, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machinepointerinfo">MachinePointerInfo</a> &amp; MPO, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccvalassign">CCValAssign</a> &amp; VA)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
The specified value has been assigned to a stack location.

Load or store it there, with appropriate extension if necessary.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/lib/target/riscv/gisel/riscvcalllowering-cpp/#l00080">80</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/lib/target/riscv/gisel/riscvcalllowering-cpp">RISCVCallLowering.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### assignValueToReg() {#ae0cbdaa8c809b18f554f6665e38d51b9}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;RISCVCallLowering.cpp&#125;::RISCVOutgoingValueHandler::assignValueToReg (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> ValVReg, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> PhysReg, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccvalassign">CCValAssign</a> &amp; VA)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
The specified value has been assigned to a physical register, handle the appropriate COPY (either to or from) and mark any relevant uses/defines as needed.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/lib/target/riscv/gisel/riscvcalllowering-cpp/#l00095">95</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/lib/target/riscv/gisel/riscvcalllowering-cpp">RISCVCallLowering.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getStackAddress() {#a0256194175f52db6cc06eb379bd412dc}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Register anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;RISCVCallLowering.cpp&#125;::RISCVOutgoingValueHandler::getStackAddress (uint64&#95;t MemSize, int64&#95;t Offset, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machinepointerinfo">MachinePointerInfo</a> &amp; MPO, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/isd/argflagsty">ISD::ArgFlagsTy</a> Flags)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Materialize a VReg containing the address of the specified stack-based object.

This is either based on a FrameIndex or direct SP manipulation, depending on the context. <code>MPO</code> should be initialized to an appropriate description of the address created.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/lib/target/riscv/gisel/riscvcalllowering-cpp/#l00062">62</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/lib/target/riscv/gisel/riscvcalllowering-cpp">RISCVCallLowering.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
